security.description: The strict-transport-security security header is not present
security.recommendation: Add HSTS header: Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains

security.description: The content-security-policy security header is not present
security.recommendation: Implement CSP header to prevent XSS attacks

security.description: The x-frame-options security header is not present
The x-content-type-options security header is not present
The x-xss-protection security header is not present
The referrer-policy security header is not present
The permissions-policy security header is not present
security.recommendation: Add Permissions-Policy to control browser features

security.description: HTTPS site without HTTP Strict Transport Security
security.recommendation: Add Strict-Transport-Security header with appropriate max-age

security.description: Page can be embedded in frames/iframes
security.recommendation: Add X-Frame-Options or CSP frame-ancestors directive

performance.recommendation: Server response time is within acceptable range
Consider allowing caching for static resources
Add ETag or Last-Modified headers for conditional requests
Page loads quickly, maintain current performance

seo.description: No title tag found on the page
seo.recommendation: Add a descriptive title tag to every page
Add a compelling meta description (150-160 characters)

seo.description: No heading tags (h1-h6) found on the page
seo.recommendation: Use proper heading structure for better SEO and accessibility
Add viewport meta tag for mobile responsiveness

seo.description: No Open Graph meta tags found
seo.recommendation: Add Open Graph tags for better social media sharing

seo.description: No Twitter Card meta tags found
seo.recommendation: Add Twitter Card tags for Twitter sharing optimization

seo.description: No internal or external links found on the page
seo.recommendation: Add relevant internal and external links for better SEO

seo.description: Error checking robots.txt and sitemap: robotsResponse.data.includes is not a function
seo.recommendation: Manually verify robots.txt and sitemap accessibility
Add more quality content (aim for 300+ words)

seo.description: No JSON-LD, microdata, or RDFa markup detected
seo.recommendation: Add structured data markup for better search results
Add canonical link tag to prevent duplicate content issues

accessibility.description: No heading structure for screen reader navigation
accessibility.recommendation: Use proper heading hierarchy (h1-h6) for page structure
Use <main> element or role="main" to identify main content

accessibility.description: Navigation areas not identified with landmarks
accessibility.recommendation: Use <nav> elements or role="navigation" for navigation areas

accessibility.description: Automated tools cannot fully assess color contrast
accessibility.recommendation: Use tools like WebAIM Contrast Checker to verify color contrast ratios

accessibility.description: No skip links found for keyboard navigation
accessibility.recommendation: Add skip links to allow keyboard users to bypass repetitive navigation

accessibility.description: No lang attribute on html element
accessibility.recommendation: Add lang attribute to html element (e.g., lang="en")

accessibility.description: No header element or banner role found
accessibility.recommendation: Use <header> element or role="banner" for page header

accessibility.description: No main element or main role found
accessibility.recommendation: Use <main> element or role="main" to identify main content

accessibility.description: No footer element or contentinfo role found
accessibility.recommendation: Use <footer> element or role="contentinfo" for page footer

accessibility.description: Page appears to have no interactive elements
accessibility.recommendation: Ensure page has focusable interactive elements

topRecommendations: Add HSTS header: Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Implement CSP header to prevent XSS attacks
Add a descriptive title tag to every page
Add a compelling meta description (150-160 characters)
Use proper heading hierarchy (h1-h6) for page structure
